competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Enterprise ERP with public sector solutions

competitors.name: SunGard
competitors.notes: Public sector software before FIS acquisition

competitors.name: Accela
competitors.notes: Civic platform for permits, licenses, and code enforcement

competitors.name: New World Systems
competitors.notes: Public safety software, acquired by Tyler in 2015

context: In 2015, Tyler Technologies acquired New World Systems for $670M, significantly expanding its public safety software portfolio. This acquisition was the largest in Tyler's history and strengthened its position in computer-aided dispatch and records management. The government software market was consolidating as Tyler built comprehensive solutions for state and local government. Competition came from enterprise vendors like SAP and Oracle as well as specialized government software companies.
